data.eml:eml: Description of the male of Culicoides (Hoffmania) baniwa Felippe-Bauer of the hylas species group (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castellón, Eloy Guillermo, Pessoa, Felipe Arley Costa, Spinelli, Gustavo, Felippe-Bauer, Maria Luiza (2012): Description of the male of Culicoides (Hoffmania) baniwa Felippe-Bauer of the hylas species group (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3401: 66-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211336
